snippet.title: Manafinder - Release Date Trailer (RPG)
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1582410/Manafinder/
Manafinder will be available on Steam and itchio on October 5th 2022!

Fight your way against ferocious beasts and other threats in this turn-based RPG as you survive in a world vastly untapped by mankind! Become a manafinder and make hard choices as you seek a better life for both yourself and other exiles. Make use of weapons, magic, elemental ores, healing plants, and your loyal dog companion Scar as you embark on this 10-12 hour long quest! 

Official Website: https://manafinder.com
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1582410/Manafinder/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/manafinder 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/manafinder/ 
itchio: https://wolfsden.itch.io/manafinder 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/manafinder 

Want to see more? Check out other Manafinder trailers!
Story trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NfXOCTE2f2I 
Announcement trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=whACMCTbmC4 

#jrpg #rpg #indiegames
